data.title: Desert Miracle, Certified Organic, Morocco 2023
data.meta_description: THE NEWEST HARVEST HAS ARRIVED!  THIS USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC EXTRA VIRGIN FIRST COLD PRESSED OLIVE OIL WAS JUST PRESSED THIS HARVEST AND EXPIRES OCT 2026. IT IS THE FRESHEST DESERT MIRACLE EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL IN THE WORLD!  BEFORE PURCHASING THIS OLIVE OIL YOU CAN CALL CHEF RASHEED AT 561-676-822
data.text:
THE NEWEST HARVEST HAS ARRIVED! THIS USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC EXTRA VIRGIN FIRST COLD PRESSED OLIVE OIL WAS JUST PRESSED THIS HARVEST AND EXPIRES OCT 2026. IT IS THE FRESHEST DESERT MIRACLE EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL IN THE WORLD!

BEFORE PURCHASING THIS OLIVE OIL YOU CAN CALL CHEF RASHEED AT 561-676-8222 Monday-Saturday 9am-6pm to help with any questions you may have about Desert Miracle.

YES, THIS IS THE EXACT SAME EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL BEING SOLD BY DR. GUNDRY HOWEVER HE HAS BEEN SELLING DESERT MIRACLE WITH HIS PRIVATE LABEL ON IT FOR 4 YEARS.

WE HAVE BEEN SELLING THE EXACT SAME BOTTLE OF DESERT MIRACLE FOR 15 YEARS WITH ONE LITTLE DIFFERENCE, the price.

Gundryâ€™s Price: $49.95 for 8.5 oz bottle of Desert Miracle

Our price: $37.95 for a 17 oz bottle of the EXACT SAME BOTTLE OF DESERT MIRACLE OLIVE OIL.

It is the same farm, it is the same farmer, the exact same olives and the exact same olive oil,even the bottle is the EXACT same shape! The only difference is our bottle is larger and we charge you less.

It is literally DESERT MIRACLE with his label on it at twice the price.

When you buy from Olive Oil Of The World your extra virgin olive oil will ALWAYS be the freshest harvest available. That is one of the reasons this Olive Oil has more polyphenols than any other Olive Oil to ever come out of Morocco.

This is a LARGE 17oz bottle of the highest ranked most awarded olive oil to ever come from the nation of Morocco.

From the Sahara desert in MOROCCO comes our most exotic extra virgin olive oil and GOLD MEDAL WINNER of the Los Angeles international Olive Oil competition: Desert Miracle. RANKING #1 by the Olive Oil Council in California. This highly flavorful full bodied oil is pressed from the very best Arbequina and indigenous Dahbia olives that have been cultivated at the foothills of the Atlas Mountains by the Aqallal family since 1887 and we have been selling it since 2007. It is very well balanced with a clear touch of fruitiness and a distinctive peppery finish . This harmonious oil is perfect for taking on a spoon in the morning, dipping, with fresh or cooked vegetables, salads, fish, poultry, and meat. Drizzle on soups and all of your favorite dips and pasta dishes. CERTIFIED ORGANIC 500 ml (17 oz) ** natural dark sediment from the olive crushing may occur with this unfiltered product **CERTIFIED USDA ORGANIC
